225 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    c) ND Music upper credit from OAU or any other 
recognized higher institution.   
(viii) PHC – No Direct Entry.   
(ix) UNN accepts   
a) for three (3)-Years  
1. Pass in NCE single major, NCE 
double major, and ND in music.  
2. Music Society of Nigeria’s Grade V  
Certificate.  
3. Trinity College of Music Grade V  
certificate  
4. Associated Board of the Royal 
Schools of Music Grade V certificate.   
b) for two(2)-Years NCE merit double major in 
Music Education  
(x) UYO accepts ND  
  
UTME  
(i) BOWEN accepts Music Society of Nigeria’s Grade 
V certificate, Trinity College of Music Grade V 
certificate and Associated Board of Royal School 
of Music Grade V Certificate  and other Arts or 
Social Science subjects.  
(ii) JOS requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, Literature in English 
and any Arts/Social Science subjects at two (2) 
sittings.  
(iii) MOUNTAIN TOP requires five (5) 'O’ level credit 
passes in English Language and another Language  
African or European and ‘O’ level credit pass in 
Music or pass at Grade V or Higher Local 
Examinations in Music of ABRSM or its 
equivalent.  
(iv) OAU accepts English Language, one (1)Arts or 
Humanities subject and three (3) from Biology,
